ar: وَلَوْ تَرَى إِذِ الْمُجْرِمُونَ نَاكِسُوا رُءُوسِهِمْ
en: If you could but see when the criminals are hanging their heads
hanging their heads before their Lord,

ar: وَلَوْ تَرَى إِذِ الْمُجْرِمُونَ نَاكِسُوا رُءُوسِهِمْ
en: If you could but see when the criminals are hanging their heads
before their Lord,
[saying], "Our Lord, we have seen and heard,
so return us [to the world];
so return us [to the world];
we will work righteousness.
Indeed, we are [now] certain."

ar: وَلَوْ شِئْنَا لَءَاتَيْنَا كُلَّ نَفْسٍ هُدَىهَا
en: And if We had willed, We could have given every soul its guidance,
but
but the word from Me will come into effect
[that] "I will surely fill Hell
but the word from Me will come into effect
[that] "I will surely fill Hell
but the word from Me will come into effect
[that] "I will surely fill Hell with jinn and people
with jinn and people all together.

ar: فَذُوقُوا بِمَا نَسِيتُمْ لِقَاءَ يَوْمِكُمْ هَذَا
en: So taste [punishment] because you forgot the meeting of this, your Day;
indeed, We have [accordingly] forgotten you.
And taste the punishment of eternity

ar: وَذُوقُوا عَذَابَ الْخُلْدِ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
en: And taste the punishment of eternity for what you used to do."
